duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the daily construction operations of the company across all regions.
Provide coaching and support for the Project Managers in the weekly activities in the field.
Assist in the development of people to help them reach their full potential.
Cultivate a healthy work environment where relationships with employees and clients are the primary means of continued company revenue.
Conduct weekly regional status meetings with team members.
Regular in-person market visits for quality control, safety compliance & coaching purposes.
Strategic team member coaching and performance improvement as needed.
Assist in sub-contractor identification and negotiations.
Conduct budget audits and regional workload audits and projections.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
